                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/wilford2017" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Chris Wilford</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/wilford2017">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">wilford2017</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Former Parliamentary Candidate - normal service <a href="/CWilford" class="tweet-url twitter-atreply pretty-link" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="0" rel="nofollow"><s>@</s><b>CWilford</b></a> All views are my own</p>

              England, United Kingdom

        </span>
      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Former and serving members of the RAF gathered for a traditional Founders Day Service at St Clements Dane and to see the launch of the <a href="/hashtag/RAFBatonRelay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RAFBatonRelay</b></a>, now on its way to 100 locations over the next 100 days as part of <a href="/hashtag/RAF100?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RAF100</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/wtrYIJXNgS" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://ow.ly/xp6g50h1gHB" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://ow.ly/xp6g50h1gHB"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">ow.ly/xp6g50h1gHB</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/Qc2Z4cJyul" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Qc2Z4cJyul</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Boris Johnson Retweeted Royal Air Force</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Congratulations to the RAF for 100 years of defending and serving our country.<a href="https://t.co/VuEtjvrg6c" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/RoyalAirForce/status/980339053529915392" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/RoyalAirForce/status/980339053529915392"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/RoyalAirForce/</span><span class="invisible">status/980339053529915392</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Boris Johnson added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/RoyalAirForce/status/980339053529915392" data-conversation-id="980339053529915392" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="980339053529915392" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="RoyalAirForce" data-user-id="92943533" href="/RoyalAirForce/status/980339053529915392" data-conversation-id="980339053529915392" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
              <div class="QuoteMedia-videoPreview">
      <img data-aria-label-part="" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/980337832228216832/pu/img/LQ5_YRdERrffEPFc.jpg" alt="" style="width: 100%; top: -0px;" />
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badge">
        <div class="AdaptiveMedia-badgeText">0:21</div>
        
      </div>
  </div>


      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Royal Air Force</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>RoyalAirForce</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">In our 100th year, we will commemorate those who have gone before, thank our service men and women and inspire the next generation so that together, we can continue to help shape our world for the next 100</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Chris Wilford Retweeted Esther McVey</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Excellent initiative, good memories of my time in the freezer at the local supermarket<a href="https://t.co/NN1DhvIkBJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/EstherMcVey1/status/980022623064281088?s=19" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/EstherMcVey1/status/980022623064281088?s=19"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/EstherMcVey1/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/980022623064281088?s=19</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Chris Wilford added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Agree with <a href="/EstherMcVey1" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="761499948890329088"><s>@</s><b>EstherMcVey1</b></a> on Saturday jobs. I manned the tills and changing rooms in BHS menswear dept in 1990s Leeds. Gave me vital experience and cash. <a href="/hashtag/9while5?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>9while5</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/YorkshireValue?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YorkshireValue</b></a><a href="https://t.co/s20OFWWg7J" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/s20OFWWg7J</a></p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Extraordinary difference. <a href="/LdnConservative" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="879444591887429632"><s>@</s><b>LdnConservative</b></a> councils like <a href="/wandbc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18020011"><s>@</s><b>wandbc</b></a> provide better services for less money. Residents don't have to settle for 2nd best.<a href="https://t.co/lg2XBgbikh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/P_G_Thompson/status/977614681971060736" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/P_G_Thompson/status/977614681971060736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/P_G_Thompson/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/977614681971060736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Momentum in <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Lewisham</b></span> didn't like the candidate picked by Labour, so now they want to scrap the role.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">ILLEGAL AND DANGEROUS PARKING ON POPLAR HIGH STREET AND WOODSTOCK TERRACE. We'll hear the usual cries of "Tory cuts", but this is exactly the sort of problem people expect action on. <a href="/hashtag/Poplar?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Poplar</b></a> needs an engaged and independent-minded Councillor who will get the area taken seriously.<a href="https://t.co/WfN7tEZcB9" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/WfN7tEZcB9</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/sajidjavid" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20052899"><s>@</s><b>sajidjavid</b></a> has today set out a cross-government plan of action to significantly reduce the number of people sleeping rough as the Homelessness Reduction Act comes into force next week.<a href="https://t.co/DJw1cPUtkX" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/DJw1cPUtkX</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"That, dear viewer, is anti-Semitism. At its deadliest and most depraved. Which is how it always ends up. Which is why it can't be tolerated. Those still in doubt need to educate themselves. Fast." <a href="/afneil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="136004952"><s>@</s><b>afneil</b></a> opening <a href="/hashtag/bbctw?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>bbctw</b></a><a href="https://t.co/MFi7pYorkB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/MFi7pYorkB</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        " data-autoplaying-media="false">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I used to think Primo Levi was wrong about a young generation becoming indifferent to the holocaust he escaped. After recent events with Corbynistas, his warning resonates anew. My take:-<a href="https://t.co/pVDBvMNCIT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://blogs.spectator.co.uk/2018/03/why-primo-levis-warning-about-the-young-forgetting-th" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://blogs.spectator.co.uk/2018/03/why-primo-levis-warning-about-the-young-forgetting-th"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">blogs.spectator.co.uk/2018/03/why-pr</span><span class="invisible">imo-levis-warning-about-the-young-forgetting-th</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/RAF100?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RAF100</b></a> is an amazing achievement, and the history of the RAF is made up of just that. Amazing achievements, undertaken by amazing people; the brave men and women on operations; and the future generations who will carry that legacy into our next 100 years<a href="https://t.co/V1pK2HeVVz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/V1pK2HeVVz</a></p>

For too long women have suffered in silence. This has to end. Thanks to @WH_APPG for organising<a href="https://t.co/akVEswCOEk" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/akVEswCOEk</a></p>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--reply u-hiddenVisually">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Island Health Trust scandal. Following the debate in parliament I think its worth highlighting that this investigation happened because of the hard work of concerned local residents. In a world of voter apathy, it shows that people CAN make a difference to the area they live in.<a href="https://t.co/kLY7Gnj5ji" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/kLY7Gnj5ji</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/MattHancock" data-user-id="19825835">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/861889973674545152/Ike2P5bh_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Matt Hancock</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>MattHancock</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">NEWS: Today weve launched our <a href="/hashtag/Fintech?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Fintech</b></a> Sector Strategy to help the UK continue to lead the way in fintech for the future.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Chief Constable Kier Pritchard has read statements on behalf of DS Nick Bailey &amp; his wife Sarah, during a press conference held at <a href="/hashtag/Salisbury?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Salisbury</b></a> District Hospital. <a href="/wiltspoliceCC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2221402406"><s>@</s><b>wiltspoliceCC</b></a> also read a statement on behalf of the Force - all are available on our website <a href="https://t.co/FLKjLj0gbE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.wiltshire.police.uk/article/1809/Statements-from-Detective-Sergeant-Nick-Bailey-his-wife-Sarah-and-Chief-Constable-Kier-Pritchard-following-DS-Bailey-s-release-from-hospital" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.wiltshire.police.uk/article/1809/Statements-from-Detective-Sergeant-Nick-Bailey-his-wife-Sarah-and-Chief-Constable-Kier-Pritchard-following-DS-Bailey-s-release-from-hospital"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">wiltshire.police.uk/article/1809/S</span><span class="invisible">tatements-from-Detective-Sergeant-Nick-Bailey-his-wife-Sarah-and-Chief-Constable-Kier-Pritchard-following-DS-Bailey-s-release-from-hospital</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/vwWAfmfRJ7" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/vwWAfmfRJ7</a></p>

</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Financial technology (aka fintech) has the capacity to deliver incredible benefits to our society: to small businesses and to ordinary people. Read my latest blog.<a href="https://t.co/NhCRE7kU6v" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/fintech-beyond-john-glen/?published=t" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/fintech-beyond-john-glen/?published=t"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">linkedin.com/pulse/fintech-</span><span class="invisible">beyond-john-glen/?published=t</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">20</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Wow - Maisie from Oscar-winning film <a href="/SilentChildFilm" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="742317637762441219"><s>@</s><b>SilentChildFilm</b></a> receives praise from <a href="/JustinTomlinson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="250311545"><s>@</s><b>JustinTomlinson</b></a> and <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> in today's Prime Minister's Questions. </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> set out what our future partnership with the EU must do:

1. Respect the result of the referendum
2. Be an enduring agreement
3. Protect jobs and security
4. Deliver an outcome consistent with the kind of country we want to be
5. Strengthen our Union of nations<a href="https://t.co/qsMb78Jmtz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/qsMb78Jmtz</a></p>
</div>

<div class="dismiss-module">
  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">If true this would be infamous<a href="https://t.co/fYZurFZ1V8" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/968804191652204544" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/968804191652204544"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes</span><span class="invisible">/status/968804191652204544</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Jacob Rees-Mogg added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/SamCoatesTimes/status/968804191652204544" data-conversation-id="968804191652204544" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="968804191652204544" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="SamCoatesTimes" data-user-id="22146373" href="/SamCoatesTimes/status/968804191652204544" data-conversation-id="968804191652204544" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Sam Coates Times</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>SamCoatesTimes</b></span>
  </div>

(Keir Starmer is in Brussels today for talks with the Commission btw) <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/BrunoBrussels/status/968797214830186496" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/BrunoBrussels/status/968797214830186496"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/BrunoBrussels/</span><span class="invisible">status/968797214830186496</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Chris Wilford Retweeted Nick Robinson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The amount of pressure being brought to bear on <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>theresa_may</b></a> and the inner strength to withstand it <a href="/hashtag/feelinginspired?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>feelinginspired</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/conviction?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>conviction</b></a> <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a><a href="https://t.co/UD4drIeltZ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcnickrobinson/status/969118417025368064?s=19" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcnickrobinson/status/969118417025368064?s=19"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcnickrobinso</span><span class="invisible">n/status/969118417025368064?s=19</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Chris Wilford added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/bbcnickrobinson/status/969118417025368064" data-conversation-id="969118417025368064" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="969118417025368064" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="bbcnickrobinson" data-user-id="25984418" href="/bbcnickrobinson/status/969118417025368064" data-conversation-id="969118417025368064" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Nick Robinson</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>bbcnickrobinson</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">People mocked May for saying Brexit means Brexit but Blair, Major, many senior civil servants &amp; much of the EU now trying to persuade her that Brexit should mean something very different. This is the political fight of the century. Helmets on.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

This is the political fight of the century. Helmets on.</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="961573503555252225" data-item-id="961573503555252225" data-permalink-path="/bbcarts/status/961573503555252225" data-conversation-id="961573503555252225" data-tweet-nonce="961573503555252225-1b3d0f23-a47d-4d5b-9555-3ddce790a006" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="964056780946006016" data-retweeter="wilford2017" data-screen-name="bbcarts" data-name="BBC Arts" data-user-id="49973923" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;49973923&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;bbcarts&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;BBC Arts&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;BBC Arts&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;BBC Arts&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2376645298&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;wilford2017&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Chris Wilford&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Chris Wilford&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Chris Wilford&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>



            <span class="js-retweet-text">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Andrew Neil Retweeted Handelsblatt Global</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today is the International Day of Zero Tolerance for FGM (Female Genital Mutilation).

We are very proud to be backing the fight to <a href="/hashtag/endFGM?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>endFGM</b></a>.<img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f53b.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Down-pointing red triangle" aria-label="Emoji: Down-pointing red triangle" />

Here is anti-FGM campaigner <a href="/NimkoAli" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="255765895"><s>@</s><b>NimkoAli</b></a> on how our investment is making a difference:<a href="https://t.co/31gbq3mabC" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/31gbq3mabC</a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Penny Mordaunt MP Retweeted ITV News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Stand up for what you believe in. Listen to others views, especially those you disagree with. 
Read widely. 
Debate politely. 
Take part in democracy. 
Encourage &amp; respect others. 
Much respect for my colleague <a href="/Jacob_Rees_Mogg" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="885838630928994304"><s>@</s><b>Jacob_Rees_Mogg</b></a> &amp; all who stand up to bullies.<a href="https://t.co/jDeHLtvubl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/itvnews/status/959534895805722626" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/itvnews/status/959534895805722626"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/itvnews/status</span><span class="invisible">/959534895805722626</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Penny Mordaunt MP added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Amazing day today. Great team out for <a href="/DavidVanDay" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="43510253"><s>@</s><b>DavidVanDay</b></a>.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Chris Wilford Retweeted Conservatives</p>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">178</span>
  </span>

  </button>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/Budget2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Budget2017</b></a> key points: 
- 3bn for Brexit preparations
- 2.8bn for NHS in England including 350m now
- 1.5bn to address Universal Credit concerns
- 500m for broadband, 5G and AI
- Stamp duty abolished for first-time buyers on properties up to 300,000
<a href="https://t.co/8OPAlpFcIJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bbc.in/2hHSklo" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bbc.in/2hHSklo"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.in/2hHSklo</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/7gVrsOEhkB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/7gVrsOEhkB</a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Following a request from the Argentine Government, <a href="/RoyalNavy" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="343961846"><s>@</s><b>RoyalNavy</b></a> s HMS Protector has been deployed to join the search and rescue effort for the <a href="/hashtag/ARASanJuan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ARASanJuan</b></a>. 

Our thoughts are with the crew of the submarine and their families.<a href="https://t.co/s60QU7NePr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/s60QU7NePr</a></p>
</div>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>

  </button>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Queen &amp; The Princess Royal are attending a reception to mark the Women's Royal Naval Service &amp; Women's Auxiliary Army Corps centenary.<a href="https://t.co/upCcoMd40S" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/upCcoMd40S</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Went behind the scenes at Upminster depot today where trains go to rest and get fixed up. Thanks <a href="/TfL" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="47319664"><s>@</s><b>TfL</b></a> for letting us try out the simulator!<a href="https://t.co/FgDetjUtJK" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/FgDetjUtJK</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Heres thoughtful piece by <a href="/RuthDavidsonMSP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="211994193"><s>@</s><b>RuthDavidsonMSP</b></a> on Scottish lessons &amp; how the Tories need to change to win in London<a href="https://t.co/LOoIPfkN0H" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.standard.co.uk/comment/comment/ruth-davidson-tories-have-to-make-a-distinct-appeal-to-win-back-londoners-a3654986.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.standard.co.uk/comment/comment/ruth-davidson-tories-have-to-make-a-distinct-appeal-to-win-back-londoners-a3654986.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">standard.co.uk/comment/commen</span><span class="invisible">t/ruth-davidson-tories-have-to-make-a-distinct-appeal-to-win-back-londoners-a3654986.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
